Hi, I'm Bojan. I am a civil engineer by degree, a software engineer by choice, and a tech nerd by obsession. From a very early age, I was that kid who would tinker around, taking everything apart so I could see how it worked. Inquisitive and focused on learning in all aspects of life - personal and professional. Adept at acquiring new skills and building interactive web pages so you don't have to!

I am also an athlete - I surf the web daily, hike severe inclines with unflagging speed, and occasionally I participate in full-contact thumb wrestling. During winter I turn into a resilient endurer of the intense North Country winter. I cook Twenty-Minute Burgers in fifteen minutes, and I put pineapple on a pizza.

I would describe myself as a relentless spirit and curious mind, focused on creating eye-catching designs and responsive, user-friendly pages. No matter what I’m working on, I’m very invested. I identify anyone I can learn from, as well as problems that I care about, trying to optimize every step of the process.

I try to give back any way that I can, and I'm excited to be a part of a company that holds the same values as I do. I have an insatiable level of curiosity and tend to do lots of research on any topic that I'm less than good at. The core values that writing code includes, like constant learning, really resonate with my personality which helps me with my inner itch to grow and develop every new day.
